trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor"></xref> for visually choosing an icon.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor"></xref> class.
Creates a string representing the valid file extensions for icons.
The string returned by the CreateExtensionsString method is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> for choosing icon files.
An array of strings holding valid file extensions.
A string that specifies the separator character.
A string containing the icon file extensions, or if extensions is or empty.
Creates a filter string for the file dialog box.
The string returned by the CreateFilterEntry method is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OpenFileDialog> for filtering icon files.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor"></xref> for which the filter string will be created.
The filter string, created from the string returned by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor.CreateExtensionsString*>.
Edits the given object value using the editor style provided by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor.GetEditStyle*> method.
A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.
A service provider object through which editing services may be obtained.
An instance of the value being edited.
The new value of the object.
If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object it was passed.
Retrieves the editing style of the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor.EditValue*> method.
If the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.IconEditor.EditValue%2A> method is not supported, the GetEditStyle method will return <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>.
A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.
One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> values indicating the provided editing style.
Retrieves an array of valid file extensions for icons.
An array of valid file extensions for icons.
Gets the description for the default file list filter provided by this editor.
The description for the default type of files to filter the file list for.
Determines if this editor supports the painting of a representation of an object's value.
A type descriptor context that can be used to provide additional context information.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.PaintValue*> is implemented; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> from the given stream.
The source stream from which the icon will be created.
The newly created <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>.
Paints a representative value of the given object to the provided canvas.
Painting should be done within the boundaries of the provided rectangle.
What to paint and where to paint it.
